name: Intro
commands: Why, is it a representative of Lord Sages?|I seem to recall you... Sal?
Well, yes...|Lady Cres, right? I remember you visiting from Grahment before.
That's right. It is so nice to see you, I trust Sages is well?
Not such, his illness is worsening.|Hence my being here in his place.
Thanks you, Cres.|Er, when does this whole thing start?
Very soon! Were you any later, it would have been rather... faux pas.
You can blame Sages' directions on that...|Oh! It's beginning!

Thank you attendees from our fellow countries.|I am touched to see the solidarity in watching a new dawn for Aurelia.|The Goddess, our divine creator, has blessed the royal lineage for centuries...|Now it is your turn, prince Elias, to become King and spread her graces!

Thank you, Archbishop Jeremiah, and everyone else in attendence.|I may be young, but I have inherited my father's passion for this country's prosperity.|I hope that we may all have fruitful relations and mutual growth across the Goddess's lands.
Now, it is time to crown you, Milord!|Are you ready to solemnly devote your life to the Goddess and her country?
Heheheha! Take this, Aurelian scum!|For Lord Sages!
Wh-what? MILORD!|Oh Goddess... Please save him...
Please brighten the future...|Let our citizens bathe in the golden light...|Argento... You must help her...|I see... bright... fleeting...
It will be done... I will carve a path to our salvation... I promise.
What manner of demon would cause this...|Did he not say... "Lord Sages"?|You... Arcein...
This must be some sort of ruse?! He would never!
So, you better explain yourself. Before you pay in blood.
What manner of chaos did you wish to cause?
YOU WILL PAY! EVERYONE, AFTER HER!|MY BROTHER... AAAAAAAAAAAAH!

I agree, but you might want to run, they're not thinking straight!|You'll be allowed sanctuary in Grahment, I'll try and smoothe this heat over for you.|The Sages I know would never organise this kind of hit job...
I will have them on a platter for you, your highness.
GAH! Arcein dastards! I will crush them as you wish, your brilliance!
Run all you wish, cockroach.|You cannot scurry away from divine punishment.
source:
transition;Close;1
chapter_title
end_skip
remove_unit;Sal

change_tilemap;Coronation
transition;Open
add_unit;Sal;7,13;immediate

speak;Cres;Why, is it a representative of Lord Sages?|I seem to recall you... Sal?
speak;Sal;Well, yes...|Lady Cres, right? I remember you visiting from Grahment before.
speak;Cres;That's right. It is so nice to see you, I trust Sages is well?
speak;Sal;Not such, his illness is worsening.|Hence my being here in his place.
speak;Cres;Oh dear... My deepest condolences...
speak;Sal;Thanks you, Cres.|Er, when does this whole thing start?
speak;Cres;Very soon! Were you any later, it would have been rather... faux pas.
speak;Sal;You can blame Sages' directions on that...|Oh! It's beginning!
multi_remove_portrait;Sal;Cres

speak;Jeremiah;Thank you attendees from our fellow countries.|I am touched to see the solidarity in watching a new dawn for Aurelia.|The Goddess, our divine creator, has blessed the royal lineage for centuries...|Now it is your turn, prince Elias, to become King and spread her graces!
speak;Elias;Thank you, Archbishop Jeremiah, and everyone else in attendence.|I may be young, but I have inherited my father's passion for this country's prosperity.|I hope that we may all have fruitful relations and mutual growth across the Goddess's lands.
speak;Jeremiah;Now, it is time to crown you, Milord!|Are you ready to solemnly devote your life to the Goddess and her country?
speak;Elias;I-

speak;EmelinePrincess;B-BROTHER! PLEASE!|STAY WITH US!
speak;Jeremiah;Wh-what? MILORD!|Oh Goddess... Please save him...
speak;Argento;This cannot be-
speak;EmelinePrincess;Elias... Can you hear me?
expression;EliasDead;HalfCloseEyes
speak;EliasDead;Urgh...|Emmie... Is that you?
speak;EmelinePrincess;Yes... I'm here...
speak;EliasDead;Please brighten the future...|Let our citizens bathe in the golden light...|Argento... You must help her...|I see... bright... fleeting...
expression;EliasDead;CloseEyes
speak;Argento;It will be done... I will carve a path to our salvation... I promise.
speak;Jeremiah;What manner of demon would cause this...|Did he not say... "Lord Sages"?|You... Arcein...

add_portrait;Cres;FarRight
speak;Cres;I agree, but you might want to run, they're not thinking straight!|You'll be allowed sanctuary in Grahment, I'll try and smoothe this heat over for you.|The Sages I know would never organise this kind of hit job...
speak;Sal;Thank you!|Gang, run!

speak;Emeline;WAAAAH! CRUSH HER ALREADY!

speak;Esteban;I will have them on a platter for you, your highness.
speak;Skill;GAH! Arcein dastards! I will crush them as you wish, your brilliance!
speak;Emeline;*Sniff* Oh thank you Sir Skill!
